name: Thibaudeau’s 5-3-1 Wave
time_per_session_breakdown: 2-3 waves x 3 sets each (~20s/set) + 2 min rest = ~12-19 min total, ~15 min average
overview_and_execution: Perform 2–3 waves of 5, 3, and 1 reps. Each wave increases the load per set, and the second (or third) wave starts heavier than the previous wave’s same rep slot.
example_application: Wave 1: 5 reps at 85%, 3 reps at 90%, 1 rep at 92.5%. Wave 2: 5 reps at 87.5%, 3 reps at 92.5%, 1 rep at 95%.
important_notes: Effective for building strength with moderate volume. Adjust number of waves based on performance and avoid grinding failures.
volume_metrics: Each wave is 5+3+1=9 reps; 2-3 waves total 18-27 reps.
